live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.

53222.summary: Some customers in the Elmhurst area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53222.title: Sept 8 - Winnipeg (Elmhurst) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.

live_updates: We continue to await restoration of power in the affected areas. Once power is restored, our services will begin to come online.
Technicians are on stand-by for remaining areas that are still not getting power. We thank you for your patience during this extended outage.
